verses.1: Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, bang hangin kei hong nusia na hi hiam? Nong huh nading ka hong thumna panin bang hangin gamla om na hi hiam?
verses.2: Ka Pasian aw, sunin kong kiko a, ahi zongin nong dawng kei hi. Zanin zong ka kiko a, ahi zongin lungsim nopna ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
verses.3: Ahih hangin nang na siangtho a, Israel-teʼ pahtawi-in na tu hi.
verses.4: Ka pate un nangmah hong muang uh hi. Amaute in hong muang uh a, nangmah in amaute na hon khia hi.
verses.5: Nangma tungah amaute in hong ko uh a, amaute kihon hi. Nangmah hong muang uh a, guaksuak lo uh hi.
verses.6: Ahih hangin kei pen lungno khat bang lel ka hi a, mi ka bang kei hi. Miteʼ ko gawpgawp, miteʼ simmawh ka hi hi.
verses.7: Hong mu mi khempeuh in kei hong zahko-in, hong mukpik san uh a, a lu uh hong pei san hi.
verses.8: “ Topaʼ tungah amah in ama thu ap hi. Amah kihonkhiasak un; amah deih ahih manin hon khia tahen!” hong cih san uh hi.
verses.9: Ahih hangin nang pen gil sung panin kei a hong suaksak pa na hi a, ka nuʼ ang sungah a muanhuai-in keimah na hong kem hi.
verses.10: Ka suah tung a kipan nangma tungah kong tung a, ka nu in hong paii lai a kipan keima Pasian na hi hi.
verses.11: Haksatna nai ahih manin kei tawh kigamla om kei in; kei a hong huh ding kuamah dang om lo hi.
verses.12: Bawngtal tampi tak in kei hong umcih uh a, Bashan gam bawngtal hatte in kei hong umcih uh hi.
verses.13: Humpinelkai hawk, a sa bawh nuam bangin amaute in kei hong kamkat beba uh hi.
verses.14: Tui buakkhiat bangin kei hong kibua khia a, ka guh ka taang khempeuh kilawi mangkhin hi. Ka lungtang khuainun bang a, ka awm sungah tui suak hi.
verses.15: Ka thahatna, leibeel phel bangin keu a, ka leii zong toncip ta hi. Nangmah in leivui sungah kei na hong koih hi.
verses.16: Ka kiimah uite om a, siatna bawl mi hon khat in kei hong umcih uh hi. Ka khut ka khete hong sun let zo uh hi.
verses.17: Ka guh khempeuh kimu thei hi. Amaute in hong sal gega uh hi.
verses.18: Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puan a hawm nadingun lai ai a san uh hi.
verses.19: Ahih hangin Topa aw, gamla om kei in. Keimah a hong huhpa aw, a huh dingin hong manlang in.
verses.20: Namsau panin keimah hong hon inla, uiteʼ kiang panin ka nuntakna hong hon in.
verses.21: Humpinelkai kam panin keimah hong hon inla, gamsialteʼ ki panin a cimawh keimah hong hon in.
verses.22: Ka u ka naute tungah nangma min ka gen dinga, mihon kikhopna laizang ah nangmah kong phat ding hi.
verses.23: Topa a zahtak mi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Jakobʼ suan mi khempeuh aw, amah min thangsak un. Israel mi khempeuh aw, amah lamdang sa un.
verses.24: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a thuak miʼ gimna simmawh bawl lo a, zong kihbawl lo hi. Ama kiang pan a mai seel lo a, ama tungah a koh ciangin, amah in a za hi.
verses.25: Mihonpite lakah nang kong phat nading na piangsak a, nang a hong zahtakteʼ mai ah ka thuciamna kong pia ding hi.
verses.26: Gimna a thuakte in kham takin ne ding uh a, amah a zongte in Topa phat ding uh hi. A lungsim uh nuam tawntung tahen!
verses.27: Leitung mi khempeuh in phawkin Topaʼ lamah kihei ding uh a, minam khempeuh in ama mai ah bia ding uh hi.
verses.28: Bang hang hiam cih leh ukna pen Topa aʼ hi a, minamte tungah amah in a uk hi.
verses.29: Hi hi, a kiphasak mi khempeuh ama mai ah kun suk ding uh a, a si thei mihing khempeuh ama mai ah kun ding uh hi.
verses.30: A hong khangkik mite in ama na sem ding uh hi. Mite in a hong piang lai ding mite tungah Topaʼ thu gen ding uh a,
verses.31: a suak nai lo mite tungah ama sep sa, hotkhiatna thu gen ding uh hi.
